column4: how can i solve this? i receive this message: E:Type 'â€˜deb-src' is not known on line 61 in source list /etc/apt/sources.list, E:The list of sources could not be read.'
There is a typing error in your /etc/apt/sources.list in line 61.
You have to edit this file as super user. <alt>F2 gksudo gedit
